SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.managers

Interface MfaManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
MfaManagerImpl
public interface MfaManager
This interface provides methods for managing Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) within the OSCAR EMR system. It provides methods for generating MFA secrets, creating TOTP URLs, generating QR code data, and managing the association of MFA secrets with user sec record.

  • Method Details

    • isOscarMfaEnabled

      static boolean isOscarMfaEnabled()
      Checks if Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) is enabled in the OSCAR system.
      Returns:
      true if MFA is enabled, false otherwise.

    • isOscarLegacyPinEnabled

      static boolean isOscarLegacyPinEnabled()
      Checks if legacy PIN authentication is enabled in the OSCAR system.
      Returns:
      true if legacy PIN authentication is enabled, false otherwise.

    • generateMfaSecret

      static String generateMfaSecret()
      Generates a random MFA secret using Base32 encoding.
      Returns:
      A randomly generated MFA secret string.

    • isMfaRegistrationRequired

      boolean isMfaRegistrationRequired(Integer securityId) throws IllegalStateException
      Determines if MFA registration is required for a given sec ID.
      Parameters:
      securityId - The ID of the sec record to check.
      Returns:
      true if MFA registration is required, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the system is in an invalid state for checking MFA registration.

    • getTotpUrl

      String getTotpUrl(String email, String secret, String appName) throws UnsupportedEncodingException
      Generates a Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) URL for a given user.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      secret - The MFA secret associated with the user.
      appName - The name of the application or service.
      Returns:
      A TOTP URL string.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - if the URL encoding is not supported.

    • getQRCodeImageData

      byte[] getQRCodeImageData(String email, String secret, String appName)
      Generates QR code image data for a given user's MFA setup.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      secret - The MFA secret associated with the user.
      appName - The name of the application or service.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the QR code image data.

    • getQRCodeImageData

      String getQRCodeImageData(Integer securityId, String secret)
      Generates QR code image data for a given sec ID and MFA secret.
      Parameters:
      securityId - The ID of the sec record.
      secret - The MFA secret associated with the user.
      Returns:
      A string representing the QR code image data.

    • saveMfaSecret

      void saveMfaSecret(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Security security, String mfaSecret) throws Exception
      Saves an MFA secret for a given sec record.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - information about the logged in user
      security - the sec object
      mfaSecret - the mfa secret
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs

    • getMfaSecret

      String getMfaSecret(Security security) throws Exception
      Retrieves the MFA secret associated with a given sec record.
      Parameters:
      security - The sec object representing the user's sec record.
      Returns:
      The MFA secret associated with the sec record.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the process of retrieving the MFA secret.

    • resetMfaSecret

      void resetMfaSecret(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Security security)
      Resets the MFA secret for a given sec record.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - Information about the logged-in user.
      security - The sec object representing the user's sec record.
